1_Math_OA.npcText: I am Alfred and I offer math games for the first class. With me you will learn Operations and Algebraic Thinking. Do you want to see my games?
1_Math_OA.gamelistTitle: Math, First class, Operations and Algebraic Thinking
1_Math_OA.gamelistDescription:
- Representing and solve problems involving addition and subtraction.
- Understand and apply properties of operations and the relationship between addition and subtraction.
- Add and subtract within 20.
- Work with addition and subtraction equations.

2_Math_OA.npcText: I am Douglas and I offer math games for the second class. With me you will learn Operations and Algebraic Thinking. Do you want to see my games?
2_Math_OA.gamelistTitle: Math, Second class, Operations and Algebraic Thinking
2_Math_OA.gamelistDescription:
- Represent and solve problems involving addition and subtraction.
- Add and subtract within 20.
- Work with equal groups of objects to gain foundations for multiplication.

3_Math_OA.npcText: I am Jane and I offer math games for the third class. With me you will learn Operations and Algebraic Thinking. Do you want to see my games?
3_Math_OA.gamelistTitle: Math, Third class, Operations and Algebraic Thinking
3_Math_OA.gamelistDescription:
- Represent and solve problems involving multiplication and division.
- Understand properties of multiplication and the relationship between multiplication and division.
- Multiply and divide within 100.
- Solve problems involving the four operations, and identify and explain patterns in arithmetic.

4_Math_OA.npcText: I am Herman and I offer math games for the fourth class. With me you will learn Operations and Algebraic Thinking. Do you want to see my games?
4_Math_OA.gamelistTitle: Math, Fourth class, Operations and Algebraic Thinking
4_Math_OA.gamelistDescription:
- Use the four operations with whole numbers to solve problems.
- Gain familiarity with factors and multiples.
- Generate and analyze patterns.

5_Math_OA.npcText: I am Richard and I offer math games for the fifth class. With me you will learn Operations and Algebraic Thinking. Do you want to see my games?
5_Math_OA.gamelistTitle: Math, Fifth class, Operations and Algebraic Thinking
5_Math_OA.gamelistDescription:
- Write and interpret numerical expressions.
- Analyze patterns and relationships.

1_Math_NBT.npcText: I am Martha and I offer math games for the first class. With me you will learn Number and Operations in Base Ten. Do you want to see my games?
1_Math_NBT.gamelistTitle: Math, First class, Number and Operations in Base Ten
1_Math_NBT.gamelistDescription:
- Extend the counting sequence.
- Understand place value.
- Use place value understanding and properties of operations to add and subtract.

2_Math_NBT.npcText: I am Alicia and I offer math games for the second class. With me you will learn Number and Operations in Base Ten. Do you want to see my games?
2_Math_NBT.gamelistTitle: Math, Second class, Number and Operations in Base Ten
2_Math_NBT.gamelistDescription:
- Understand place value.
- Use place value understanding and properties of operations to add and subtract.

3_Math_NBT.npcText: I am Malcolm and I offer math games for the third class. With me you will learn Number and Operations in Base Ten. Do you want to see my games?
3_Math_NBT.gamelistTitle: Math, Third class, Number and Operations in Base Ten
3_Math_NBT.gamelistDescription: - Use place value understanding and properties of operations to perform multi-digit arithmetic.

4_Math_NBT.npcText: I am Kristi and I offer math games for the fourth class. With me you will learn Number and Operations in Base Ten. Do you want to see my games?
4_Math_NBT.gamelistTitle: Math, Fourth class, Number and Operations in Base Ten
4_Math_NBT.gamelistDescription:
- Generalize place value understanding for multi-digit whole numbers.
- Use place value understanding and properties of operations to perform multi-digit arithmetic.

5_Math_NBT.npcText: I am Bryant and I offer math games for the fifth class. With me you will learn Number and Operations in Base Ten. Do you want to see my games?
5_Math_NBT.gamelistTitle: Math, Fifth class, Number and Operations in Base Ten
5_Math_NBT.gamelistDescription:
- Understand the place value system.
- Perform operations with multi-digit whole numbers and with decimals to hundredths.

1_Math_MD.npcText: I am Eleanor and I offer math games for the first class. With me you will learn Measurement and Data. Do you want to see my games?
1_Math_MD.gamelistTitle: Math, First class, Measurement and Data
1_Math_MD.gamelistDescription:
- Measure lengths indirectly and by iterating length units.
- Tell and write time.
- Represent and interpret data.

2_Math_MD.npcText: I am Carrie and I offer math games for the second class. With me you will learn Measurement and Data. Do you want to see my games?
2_Math_MD.gamelistTitle: Math, Second class, Measurement and Data
2_Math_MD.gamelistDescription:
- Measure and estimate lengths in standard units.
- Relate addition and subtraction to length.
- Work with time and money.
- Represent and interpret data.

3_Math_MD.npcText: I am Joseph and I offer math games for the third class. With me you will learn Measurement and Data. Do you want to see my games?
3_Math_MD.gamelistTitle: Math, Third class, Measurement and Data
3_Math_MD.gamelistDescription:
- Solve problems involving measurement and estimation of intervals of time, liquid volumes, and masses of objects.
- Represent and interpret data.
- Geometric measurement: understand concepts of area and relate area to multiplication and to addition.
- Geometric measurement: recognize perimeter as an attribute of plane figures and distinguish between linear and area measures.

4_Math_MD.npcText: I am Shawn and I offer math games for the fourth class. With me you will learn Measurement and Data. Do you want to see my games?
4_Math_MD.gamelistTitle: Math, Fourth class, Measurement and Data
4_Math_MD.gamelistDescription:
- Solve problems involving measurement and conversion of measurements from a larger unit to a smaller unit.
- Represent and interpret data.
- Geometric measurement: understand concepts of angle and measure angles.

5_Math_MD.npcText: I am Patrick and I offer math games for the fifth class. With me you will learn Measurement and Data. Do you want to see my games?
5_Math_MD.gamelistTitle: Math, Fifth class, Measurement and Data
5_Math_MD.gamelistDescription:
- Convert like measurement units within a given measurement system.
- Represent and interpret data.
- Geometric measurement: understand concepts of volume and relate volume to multiplication and to addition.

1_Math_G.npcText: I am Eric and I offer math games for the first class. With me you will learn Geometry. Do you want to see my games?
1_Math_G.gamelistDescription: - Reason with shapes and their attributes.

2_Math_G.npcText: I am Ali and I offer math games for the second class. With me you will learn Geometry. Do you want to see my games?
2_Math_G.gamelistDescription: - Reason with shapes and their attributes.

3_Math_G.npcText: I am Theresa and I offer math games for the third class. With me you will learn Geometry. Do you want to see my games?
3_Math_G.gamelistDescription: - Reason with shapes and their attributes.

4_Math_G.npcText: I am Dwayne and I offer math games for the fourth class. With me you will learn Geometry. Do you want to see my games?
4_Math_G.gamelistDescription: - Draw and identify lines and angles, and classify shapes by properties of their lines and angles.

5_Math_G.npcText: I am Lauren and I offer math games for the fifth class. With me you will learn Geometry. Do you want to see my games?
5_Math_G.gamelistDescription:
- Graph points on the coordinate plane to solve real-world and mathematical problems.
- Classify two-dimensional figures into categories based on their properties.

3_Math_NF.npcText: I am Donald and I offer math games for the third class. With me you will learn Number and Operations Fractions. Do you want to see my games?
3_Math_NF.gamelistTitle: Math, Third class, Number and Operations Fractions
3_Math_NF.gamelistDescription: - Develop understanding of fractions as numbers.

4_Math_NF.npcText: I am Susie and I offer math games for the fourth class. With me you will learn Number and Operations Fractions. Do you want to see my games?
4_Math_NF.gamelistTitle: Math, Fourth class, Number and Operations Fractions
4_Math_NF.gamelistDescription:
- Extend understanding of fraction equivalence and ordering.
- Build fractions from unit fractions by applying and extending previous understandings of operations on whole numbers.
- Understand decimal notation for fractions, and compare decimal fractions.

5_Math_NF.npcText: I am Benjamin and I offer math games for the fifth class. With me you will learn Number and Operations Fractions. Do you want to see my games?
5_Math_NF.gamelistTitle: Math, Fifth class, Number and Operations Fractions
5_Math_NF.gamelistDescription:
- Use equivalent fractions as a strategy to add and subtract fractions.
- Apply and extend previous understandings of multiplication and division to multiply and divide fractions.

2_English_RI.gamelistTitle: English, Second class, Reading: Informational Text

1_Chest_Forest.npcText: I am Bryant and I offer math games for the fifth class. With me you will learn Number and Operations in Base Ten. Do you want to see my games?

2_Chest_Forest.npcText: I am Hans. You see here the oldest tree of the world. Did you know the tallest tree is 380 feet high!

1_Chest_Tropen.npcText: I am Bryant and I offer math games for the fifth class. With me you will learn Number and Operations in Base Ten. Do you want to see my games?

2_Chest_Tropen.npcText: I am Hans. You see here the oldest tree of the world. Did you know the tallest tree is 380 feet high!

2_Chest_Desert.npcText: I am Hans. You see here the oldest tree of the world. Did you know the tallest tree is 380 feet high!

2_Chest_Snow.npcText: I am Hans. You see here the oldest tree of the world. Did you know the tallest tree is 380 feet high!

2_Chest_Lava.npcText: I am Hans. You see here the oldest tree of the world. Did you know the tallest tree is 380 feet high!

Portal_Start_to_Forest.npcTextAllowed: You are worthy. Please go ahead!
